content: -    🪙* ONYX Core *🪙    -The ultra fast PoW Blockchain[BlockTime: 5sec | Supply: 1.000.000.000 | Halving: ~10years]🌐 WEBSITE: "https://onyx.run"🌐 BLOCK EXPLORER: "https://explorer.onyx.run" MINING POOL:[⛏ EU POOL: https://pool-eu.onyx.run[⛏ US POOL: https://pool-us.onyx.run[⛏ AS POOL: https://pool-as.onyx.run⚠️ SOURCE CODE: https://github.com/ONYXcore/onyx👛 Win64 WALLET: https://github.com/ONYXcore/onyx/releases/download/v1.0.1/onyx-win.zip👛 Linux Wallet: https://github.com/ONYXcore/onyx/releases/download/v1.0.1/onyx-linux.zip-    🖥 miner: https://github.com/bubasik/cpuminer-opt-yespower-    🖥 mining command: -a yespower -o stratum+tcp://pool-(us/eu/as).onyx.run:(port) -u YOURwallet
